info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 7:25PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Schenectady, Fulton, central Saratoga and central Montgomery Counties through 815 PM EST... At 725 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Caroga Lake Public Campground to near Fort Plain. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Gloversville, Johnstown, Caroga Lake Public Campground and Caroga Lake around 730 PM EST. Mayfield around 735 PM EST. Fonda, Broadalbin, Cranberry Creek and Northampton Beach Public Campground around 740 PM EST. Tribes Hill around 745 PM EST. Amsterdam, Hagaman and Fort Johnson around 750 PM EST. Glenville, Milton, Pattersonville-Rotterdam Junction, Rotterdam Junction and Rock City Falls around 755 PM EST. Saratoga Springs, Scotia and Galway around 800 PM EST. Niskayuna, Ballston Spa, Burnt Hills, Alplaus, North Ballston Spa and East Glenville around 805 PM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Parkis Mills, Meco, Charleston, Glenridge, Hoffmans, Glenwild, Garrison Manor, Wiley Corners, Woodruff Heights and Halls Corner. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 near exit 25. Interstate 90 between exits 25a and 29. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 7. Interstate 87 between exits 10 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
